column2: Percent of patients who reported that their nurses "Sometimes" or "Never" communicated well.

column4: Percent of patients who reported that their nurses "Always" communicated well.

column8: Percent of patients who reported that they "Sometimes" or "Never" received help as soon as they wanted.
column9: Percent of patients who reported that they "Usually" received help as soon as they wanted.
column10: Percent of patients who reported that they "Always" received help as soon as they wanted.
column11: Percent of patients who reported that their pain was "Sometimes" or "Never" well controlled.

column14: Percent of patients who reported that staff "Sometimes" or "Never" explained about medicines before giving it to them.

column17: Percent of patients who reported that their room and bathroom were "Sometimes" or "Never" clean.
column18: Percent of patients who reported that their room and bathroom were "Usually" clean.
column19: Percent of patients who reported that their room and bathroom were "Always" clean.
column20: Percent of patients who reported that the area around their room was "Sometimes" or "Never" quiet at night.

column23: Percent of patients who reported that YES,they were given information about what to do during their recovery at home.
column24: Percent of patients who reported that they were not given information about what to do during their recovery at home.
column25: Percent of patients who gave their hospital a rating of 6 or lower on a scale from 0 (lowest) to 10 (highest).
column26: Percent of patients who gave their hospital a rating of 7 or 8 on a scale from 0 (lowest) to 10 (highest).
column27: Percent of patients who gave their hospital a rating of 9 or 10 on a scale from 0 (lowest) to 10 (highest).

column30: Percent of patients who reported YES,they would definitely recommend the hospital.
